import React from 'react'; const StatCard = ({ title, children }) => (
{title}
{children}
); const LeftIcon = ({ children }) => (
{children}
); const Dashboard = () => { const bgUrl = "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1482192505345-5655af888cc4?auto=format&fit=crop&w=2000&q=80"; return (
{/* Background image + dark overlay + blur */}
{/* Left vertical icon bar */}
{/* Main content area */}

DASHBOARD

{/* Left column: overall consumption + bills under it */}
OVERALL CONSUMPTION Yearly ▾
[Overall chart]
{/* Bills below overall consumption - two equal columns */}
Overall Bill
P 1,000,000
Upcoming Bill
P 123,467
{/* Right column: pie and appliances */}
CONSUMPTION BY ROOM
[Pie chart]
APPLIANCES
[Appliances bar chart]
{/* History table */}
HISTORY Yearly ▾
LOCATION TIMESTAMP CURRENT kWh PAST kWh PERCENTAGE
Kitchen 00:00:00 1 kWh 2 kWh 10%
Dining Area 00:00:00 1 kWh 2 kWh 10%
); }; export default Dashboard;
